title: Robert Reich
deleted: Reich has been known to publicly express extreme leftist views.  In October 2020, Reich tweeted; “When this nightmare is over, we need a Truth and Reconciliation Commission. It would erase Trump’s lies, comfort those who have been harmed by his hatefulness, and name every official, politician, executive, and media mogul whose greed and cowardice enabled this catastrophe.” <ref>{{cite web |title=Videos |url=https://www.https://www.chicagotribune.com/columns/john-kass/ct-truth-reconciliation-kass-20201021-f4krpwvpvjgxvb2fv7hxnapdfy-story.html}}</ref>  The Washington Post noted the McCarthyist implications of the controversial recommendation.
